name: BABABOOM
description: BABABOOM is a fast paced local multi-player platformer flash game currently in Beta, there are two game modes, power up grab and deathmatch. One player will play as the sheep who can drop bombs that blow up after a timer and the other player will play as the farmer who can chop off the sheep's head. The game employs an insta-kill mechanic to speed up the gameplay making it about tactical positioning and feinting (like fencing).
